text:
https://www.area1security.com/ | Redwood City, CA | ONSITE | Full-time, relocation

* Test-Automation Engineer

Coding ability (esp in python) and a passion for test automation are the only real requirements that matter.

We're a cyber-security company focused on solving the problem of focused attacks by targeted threats.

Details on who we are: https://www.themuse.com/companies/area1security Full posting: https://jobs.lever.co/area1security/8b013143-5a5a-41a9-8cd8-...

Interview process is typically two phone screens followed by an on-site interview. Feel free to DM with questions.
